products.title: Luna Blackout Shadow Black - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna Blackout Shadow Black - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Black. Made to measure from £19.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luna Blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.

products.title: Skye Flint Grey (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Flint Grey (Blackout) Velux Windows 1992-2001 from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 1992-2001 online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Ribbons Solar Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Ribbons Solar Silver Pleated Skylight Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Ribbons Solar, a very affordable and quality blinds perfect for any home, there are many beautiful colours to choose from.  Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer.  A perfect thermal fabric.

products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Grey (1158)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Grey (1158) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.

products.productdescription:
Low maintenance, moisture resistant Venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment.

 	Perfect for high humidity rooms.
 	Easy to clean.
 	Optimum light adjustment.
 	Preserves your view whole providing privacy.

 	Installs in minutes.
 	9 colour choices.
